featured.headline: Review of LG UHD TV 65 inch 65UR8000
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am reviewing my new purchase i.e. LG UHD TV 65 inch 65UR8000 which i just recently bought.
Let's get started with the major features of it.
1. Picture Quality: The picture quality of the TV is really fascinating as it is vivid and each color provides you clear visibility in the image you are viewing. And having various options assist you to adapt the way you want to use it for multiple purpose.
2. Sound Quality: Sound quality is great as it gets you immersed in whatever you are listening.
3. Setup and Installation: Really easy being the tv is really lighweight.
Overall, i am enjoying it my fullest and would highly recommend you all.
featured.author: Umerkhan

featured.body: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Bought it two weeks ago and love the picture and all the different features this tv has!! It‚Äôs like being at a movie theater but I‚Äôm in my recliner!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüòä
featured.author: Fischer79

featured.headline: Greatest Features
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Greatest TV. I have ever owned.
Smart TV & Smart Remote. Operates all of my screens like security systems.
featured.author: Bobby 65

featured.headline: Excellent quality and easy to use!
featured.body: We bought these three weeks ago and love it! It has a great quality picture and is very easy to use. It is also one of the few TV‚Äôs you can load both Peleton  and Les Mils App! We put this in our workout room and it is perfect.
featured.author: Anonym

featured.headline: Great features!
featured.body: Love this television. great buy great features.....speak to change channels is wonderful!
featured.author: pabe

featured.headline: Fabulous TV for a great price!
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The quality of this TV is amazing. The picture is very clear and the colors are vivid. When watching a movie or TV show, it feels like you are actually in the program instead of on a couch. The sound quality is great! I love the ability to customize this TV to my liking. My husband has his PS5 hooked up to it as well. The quality of the picture and audio while playing on his PS5 is great and far better than our previous TV. 
The ability to stream PlutoTV on here is a big plus. We are a cable free household and rely solely on streaming services. 
If you are in the market for a TV, definitely give this one a look!
featured.author: smish20023

featured.headline: Would buy LG again
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this Tv a few weeks ago, and I‚Äôm very happy with this purchase. This is my first LG Tv, but I‚Äôm very satisfied with the overall profile, the brightness and the resolution. The Tv very thin,  fit perfectly on my cabinet andIt was very easy to hook up.

As for the picture, I love that I have no issues I. The middle of the day and it looks beautiful at night. 

I‚Äôve had some sissy‚Äôs with the remote and the app,  but that‚Äôs probably just user error
featured.author: TheDanns

featured.headline: Great Price. Still looking for best viewing settin
featured.body: Now at the 6 week mark in my relationship with this 2023 LG50UR8000AUA. The picture is Excellent if you are sitting with a straight on viewing angle. If you deviate 20 degrees from this angle the colors are washed out to the point of making the set unwatchable.  I continue to play with the settings to compensate for this issue, but I can "fix" this issue.
featured.author: kpb28

review.headline: Review of LG UHD TV 65 inch 65UR8000
review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am reviewing my new purchase i.e. LG UHD TV 65 inch 65UR8000 which i just recently bought.
Let's get started with the major features of it.
1. Picture Quality: The picture quality of the TV is really fascinating as it is vivid and each color provides you clear visibility in the image you are viewing. And having various options assist you to adapt the way you want to use it for multiple purpose.
2. Sound Quality: Sound quality is great as it gets you immersed in whatever you are listening.
3. Setup and Installation: Really easy being the tv is really lighweight.
Overall, i am enjoying it my fullest and would highly recommend you all.

review.headline: Fabulous TV for a great price!

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The quality of this TV is amazing. The picture is very clear and the colors are vivid. When watching a movie or TV show, it feels like you are actually in the program instead of on a couch. The sound quality is great! I love the ability to customize this TV to my liking. The ability to stream PlutoTV on here is a big plus. We are a cable free household and rely solely on streaming services. 
If you are in the market for a TV, definitely give this one a look!
